Detailed Description

template<>
class Teuchos::ValueTypeConversionTraits< int, double >

Convert double to int, without compiler warnings, with optional range check.

Definition at line 306 of file Teuchos_as.hpp.

Member Function Documentation

static int Teuchos::ValueTypeConversionTraits< int, double >::convert ( const double  t)
inlinestatic

Convert the given double to an int.

Warning
Double-precision floating-point values (64 bits) may overflow int (32 bits). You should use safeConvert() if you aren't sure that the given value fits in int.
